title: Effective Learning Design Strategies Using Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design concepts and data interpretation skills
context.additional_context: A course operating in constrained smartphone-centric environments, emphasizing hands-on practice with learning analytics visualization tools.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the main functions and usage methods of a learning analytics (LA) visualization dashboard.
Learners can interpret and utilize analytical data to improve instructional design (LD).
Learners can assess instructional design using mobile-based visualization tools in limited technological environments.
Learners can analyze diverse learner data (e.g., engagement, grades) to design personalized educational strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
